data.text: Mwana yawele na luhala kanguhulichizaga malajizo ga mhaza wa heye,
Munhu yawele na nhumbula inojile kangupataga ganojile kulawa kuli ulonzi wa heye,
Yalinguudima mlomo wa heye kangwamilaga kikala kwa heye,
Mgata kanguwaga na maya ila hambe yapate choneche,
Yatanganiche kanguuzudilaga udesi,
Kutanganika kwanguwamilaga wagoloche nhumbula,
Wamwenga wangiditaga kota wana lufufu kuno wahela chinhu,
Lufufu lwa munhu lwoweza kumgombola,
Watanganiche wangupulikaga kota chenje chilingwaka goya,
Kidaya kwangwambuzaga kilewa hela,
Lufufu lwa himahima lwangwajililaga,
Kitumbila kwa kubeteza ng'hatu kwangulumiza nhumbula,
Yalingubeza ulonzi unojile kangigalila kudumigwa,
Malanguso ga wawele na luhala ndo nzasa ya ukomu,
Yawele na kuvizela kangigalaga uganililo,
Yawele na luhala kanguditaga chila chinhu kwa nyhala,
Msenga yehile kanguwenjizaga wanhu kuli magazo,
Uzunwa na kudeula vyangumpataga yalingugabeza malanguso,
Kwangusangalala hala houpata chila choulingugana.
Yalinguwa hamwe na wawele na luhala kangupataga luhala,
Walingudita gehile wanguwaga na magazo ng'hatu,
Munhu yanojile kanguwalechelaga uhalizi walelwa wa heye,
Mgunda wa mzunwa wangulavyaga mbena nyinji,
Yohambe yamzape mwanage kwa makanyo hambe yamgane,
Yatanganiche kanacho chilyo cha kuhega,
